Class Menu

java.lang.Object
me.phoenix.slimelib.inventory.Menu

InventoryHolder
public class Menu extends Object implements InventoryHolder
A custom inventory Menu.

  • Constructor Details

    • Menu

      public Menu(JavaPlugin plugin, int size, net.kyori.adventure.text.Component title)
      Instantiates a new Menu.
      Parameters:
      plugin - the plugin
      size - the size of the menu (9, 18, 27, 36, 45, 54)
      title - the title of the menu

  • Method Details

    • playerInteractable

      public void playerInteractable(boolean isInteractable)
      Toggle whether the player can interact with the menu or not. If this is set to true then players will be able to take out items without a click handler associated with them.
      Parameters:
      isInteractable - true to make it interactable, false otherwise

    • playerInteractable

      public boolean playerInteractable()
      Get if the menu is player interactable or not.
      Returns:
      the boolean
